sourcesContent:
import * as yup from "yup";
const passwordRules = /^(?=.*\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z]).{5,}$/; // min 5 characters, 1 upper case letter, 1 lower case letter, 1 numeric digit.


export const signupschema=yup.object().shape({
    email: yup
    .string()
    .email("Please Enter a Valid Email.")
    .required("Required"),
    
    age: yup
    .number()
    .positive()
    .integer()
    .required(),

    password: yup
    .string()
    .min(5)
    .matches(passwordRules,{message:"Please Enter a Stronger Password!"})
    .required("Required"),

    confirmpassword: yup
    .string()
    .oneOf([yup.ref('password'),null],"Password Must Match The Previous One!")
    .required("Required"),


})
